channel.title: Getting Started on Ninja Programming Language
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Ninja Programming Language

item.title: Installation
item.description: macOS Homebrew brew tap gravatalonga/ninja-lang brew install ninja-lang Linux Rpm / Yum To enable, add the following file /etc/yum.repos.d/fury.repo: [fury] name=Gemfury Private Repo baseurl=https://yum.fury.io/gravatalonga/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0 Check if correctly created yum --disablerepo=* --enablerepo=fury list available To install you only need run following command: yum install ninja-lang APT To configure apt access, create a following file /etc/apt/sources.list.d/fury.list with content of : deb [trusted=yes] https://apt.fury.io/gravatalonga/ / Or use this one line command:

item.title: Usage
item.description: REPL Started as REPL with ninja-lang Executing File ninja-lang my-code.ninja Inline code ninja-lang -e "var a = 1; a;"
